hero.title: TELENATURA
hero.subtitle: Sovereign Data Platform for the Agri-Food Chain
hero.description: TELENATURA connects producers, distributors and retailers in a secure data ecosystem, ensuring farm-to-table traceability.

solutions.title: Value Chain Digitalization
solutions.description: Tools for every link in the agri-food chain.

traceability.title: Integral Traceability
traceability.description: Tracking from origin to point of sale with immutable data.

quality.title: Quality Control
quality.description: Monitoring of transport and storage conditions.

certification.title: Certifications
certification.description: Digital management of organic certificates, designations of origin.

dataSpace.title: Connected Data Ecosystem
dataSpace.description: TELENATURA operates as a node of the PROCUREDATA ecosystem, enabling secure data exchange between all actors in the chain.

organic.title: Organic Certification
organic.description: Automatic verification of cultivation practices for bio labels.

freshness.title: Guaranteed Freshness
freshness.description: Real-time IoT monitoring of cold chain.

dop.title: Designation of Origin
dop.description: Certified geographic traceability for premium products.

cta.title: Do you produce, distribute or sell food?
cta.description: Join TELENATURA and access the most complete data network in the agri-food sector.
